title: Xbox Showcase Date Finally Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.06.20
description:
Tim and Imran talk about their thoughts on what we will see at the Xbox showcase, Breath of the Wild 2 updates, Final Fantasy VII Part 2 working from home, and more. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:42 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
Every day this week a new part of Andy’s Full Playthrough of The Last of Us Part 2 will post at 3PM PT on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Iron Man VR Review on PS I Love You on Tuesday
The Roper Report   -
00:04:55 - Xbox Games Showcase Revealed (Xbox Twitter)
00:25:35 - 8BitDo Announces xCloud Controller (Tom Warren at The Verge)
00:28:09 - 30 Minutes of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla Leak (Joe Skrebels at IGN)
00:35:13 - Breath of the Wild 2 Voice Actors Say Their Work On Game Is Done (Joe Skrebels IGN)
00:37:50 - Final Fantasy Remake Part 2 Being Worked on From Home (Joe Skrebels IGN)
00:44:00 - Left 4 Dead Creators Reveal Concept Art (Joe Skrebels IGN)
00:45:40 - Out today
00:51:45 - Quip
00:52:50 -  Klarna
00:54:18 -  Hims
 Reader mail   -
00:55:35 - Do you hope or expect to see Sony implement anything similar in the near future? - Nano Biologist
01:00:30 - Squad Up:Ben (PleaseBeXcited)
01:01:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Imran and Blessing
